title: Memoir Writing: How to Write A Story From Your Life
description: Have you got a story you’re burning to tell – a true story from your life (not your WHOLE life story – memoir is a part of your life). The events you want to write about, did they last weeks, months, or years? You decide.•Do you think it’s a cracking good story?•Read this book to find out how to turn YOUR STORY into a memoir. •Chapters include planning, story-telling, place and time, character, description, voice, publishing and marketing. This book explains how you can develop your writing skills and avoid some of the pitfalls that can be encountered.
author: Anna Meryt
